projects.name: Violet
projects.description: An experimental black and white film, with no script, just raw emotioins.

projects.name: Batman™: Gotham City Chronicles
projects.description: Fight for Gotham City as the heroes or work alone as the villain in a miniatures boardgame for 2 to 4 players exclusive to Kickstarter.
projects.reward: copy of Batman™: Gotham City Chronicles

projects.name: Chirault: The Complete Series
projects.description: Printing the final two volumes of Chirault, an epic fantasy comic series!
projects.reward: PDF copies of the two new volumes (4 and 5), and my eternal gratitude!

projects.name: BACK Book 2
projects.description: The second volume of BACK, a weird western webcomic by Anthony Clark (Nedroid Picture Diary, Beartato) and KC Green (Gunshow).
projects.reward: Both PDFs for your e-reading pleasure.

projects.name: Only Roundup Remains - a documentary film
projects.description: Eight cowboys round up cattle from 50,000 acres of Montana forest. This is the documentation of a 115-yr-old dying American tradition.
